sources.name: UTAggregatedAmounts
sources.script:
source(output(
		OrganizationUUID as string,
		ReportingUnitUUID as string,
		VariableSpecificUUID as string,
		BeneficialUseCategory as string,
		PrimaryUseCategory as string,
		WaterSourceUUID as string,
		MethodUUID as string,
		TimeframeStart as string,
		TimeframeEnd as string,
		DataPublicationDate as string,
		DataPublicationDOI as string,
		ReportYearCV as string,
		Amount as string,
		PopulationServed as string,
		PowerGeneratedGWh as string,
		IrrigatedAcreage as string,
		InterbasinTransferToID as string,
		InterbasinTransferFromID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTAggregatedAmounts

sinks.name: NormalizedAggregatedAmounts
sinks.script:
UTAggregatedAmounts sink(input(
		OrganizationUUID as string,
		ReportingUnitUUID as string,
		VariableSpecificUUID as string,
		BeneficialUseCategory as string,
		PrimaryUseCategory as string,
		WaterSourceUUID as string,
		MethodUUID as string,
		TimeframeStart as string,
		TimeframeEnd as string,
		DataPublicationDate as string,
		DataPublicationDOI as string,
		ReportYearCV as string,
		Amount as string,
		PopulationServed as string,
		PowerGeneratedGWh as string,
		IrrigatedAcreage as string,
		InterbasinTransferToID as string,
		InterbasinTransferFromID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	partitionFileNames:['aggregatedamounts.csv']) ~> NormalizedAggregatedAmounts
